title: thelivingtrashcan's municipal art disposal facility
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=image https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVjFyAfX0AEl3zC?format=jpg&name=large]]

animation student who draws scps (read: mekhanites) every so often

i have a [https://twitter.com/livintrashcan twitter] and an [https://www.instagram.com/thelivingtrashcan/ instagram] too

(you might also know me as [https://www.reddit.com/user/PETApitaS/ PETApitaS] or BrenZan/Brenzo)

((please follow me!! i'd really appreciate it))

++ mekhanites and other assorted bronze age folks

big fan of historical scps, and the universe of 2406 is just real nice so that happens to be what i pour my energy into mostly - chasing after the ideal depiction is my mission

//pieces shown from oldest to newest//

[[collapsible show="SCP-2406, the 9th Colossus" hide="- Close"]][[image https://78.media.tumblr.com/5c7c29fe271ce03b67198f0bd2e44238/tumblr_pcclggejOo1wg3df1o1_1280.png]]
